ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope I was clawed to death.  I scrolled back my text window to see what happened.  Several line is a row of Gorenaire claws you for 256 pts of damage .  I
ygData.messageBody:
Nope I was clawed to death. I scrolled back my text window to see what
happened. Several line is a row of "Gorenaire claws you for 256 pts of
damage". I literally went from full health to death in a microsecond.

Galtin of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [mailto:birdman@...]
Sent: Friday, November 17, 2000 11:56 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest


On Fri, 17 Nov 2000, Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n) wrote:

> So did I die to a bug or will Gorenaire, once aggroed, attack anyone near
> her, even if they weren't involved in the attack?

My guess would be you were hit by her AE, and since she "chose" to attack
you you were placed on her list of potential targets which, coupling with
the selfbuffing and low level/hp (relatively) that you had at the time,
turned her attention to you.

She won't aggro on you being warmly at other times (I've run up and said
hello plenty myself =), but while under attack all bets are off.

Athren Notechaser, 57th composition in progress
<The Relentless> Cazic-Thule



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
